Title: June 2012
Content: 8*p39853a0824*13 metrology is the science of measurement and world metrology day is may 20th.  in 2010, the day was used to celebrate the 50th anniversary of the si system. a metrologist from the national physical laboratory said on a radio programme that the si system uses units that everyone can understand.  he stated the following example.      if you hold an apple in your hand its about a newton, if you raise it through one metre thats about a joule and if you do it in one second thats about a watt. assuming that the apple has a mass of 100 g, explain and justify the statements made about the three words in italics.(6) (total for question 13 = 6 marks)
